metadata.title: CVE-2024-27282 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Ruby 3.x through 3.3.0. If attacker-supplieddata is provided to the Ruby regex compiler, it is possible to extractarbitrary heap data relative to the start of the text, including pointersand sensitive strings. The fixed versions are 3.0.7, 3.1.5, 3.2.4, and3.3.1.

criterions.comment: ruby2.7 package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
